title: mc服务器斩首插件漏洞如何解决?
author: ob20000314
txt_content: [url=http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=88233&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D7%26searchoption[62][value]%3D%25E5%25A4%25B4%25E9%25A2%2585%26searchoption[62][type]%3D]http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=88233&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D7%26searchoption[62][value]%3D%25E5%25A4%25B4%25E9%25A2%2585%26searchoption[62][type]%3D[/url]mc1.7.2服务器斩首掉落的头颅放置后玩家无法开采，服务器装了Neverlag和SBC插件，求解决方案

replies.author: xRPQx
replies.txt_content:
